items.headline: My husband’s kids didn’t even show up for his heart surgery. So why is he leaving them his $1 million life insurance?
items.summary_en: “Both of us were widowed. We are in our late 60s and retired.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have an ethical responsibility?
items.summary_en: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I need to spend $15K on my roof. Should I take it from my Roth IRA, 401(k), IRA or money-market account?
items.summary_en: “I’m 61 years old, single and still have a job.”

items.headline: Michael Burry flags risks from Japanese yen to U.S. stocks as ‘rate check’ stirs debate
items.summary_en: The Big Short investor Michael Burry says the Japanese yen is due a reversal as a so-called “rate check” stirred debate over whether an appreciation in the Asian currency’s country would bleed over into U.S. stocks.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘It’s an expensive piece of equipment’: My neighbor asked to borrow my snowblower. Do I say yes?
items.summary_en: “The projected snowfall this weekend doesn’t look to be changing too much.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Bets on a U.S. government shutdown spike after latest civilian death in Minnesota
items.summary_en: Bets on a government shutdown happening by Jan. 31 are now at 78%, spiking over the weekend following another civilian death in Minnesota.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: U.S. stock futures fall, gold hits record ahead of Fed meeting, Big Tech earnings
items.summary_en: U.S. stock futures slumped and gold hit a record high Sunday as investors look ahead to a Fed interest-rate decision and Big Tech earnings this week.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: About 20,000 U.S. flights have been canceled due to the winter storm — and counting
items.summary_en: Airlines have canceled about 20,000 flights due to a winter storm expected to wallop two-thirds of the U.S. over the weekend — with hubs in Dallas and Atlanta among the most affected.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Gold now costs more than $5,000 an ounce. Here’s how it got to this milestone price.
items.summary_en: It’s been a long journey for gold and silver to reach their highest levels on record, but the steep climb for both over the past 12 months has been a notable one — marked by significant, market-moving events, with many of those tied to actions by President Donald Trump.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I started working as a dishwasher at age 13. Social Security refuses to acknowledge this. Am I being cheated?
items.summary_en: “I am 69, and started collecting Social Security when I was 66½.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.
